name: Aria Everdream
backStory: Aria Everdream, an ethereal Elf, was born under the shimmering moon of the Celestial Dreamlands. From a young age, she displayed a natural affinity for weaving dreams, harnessing their power to bring serenity and harmony to the realm. Trained by the ancient Dreamweavers, she honed her skills in the art of shaping dreams and soothing nightmares. As the balance of the Dreamlands trembles on the edge of chaos, Aria steps forth as the chosen Protector of Dreams, tasked with restoring peace and safeguarding the realm from the encroaching darkness of nightmares.
